tool_sequence.command: fvm list 2>/dev/null || echo "FVM not found in PATH"
fvm releases 2>/dev/null | head -30 || echo "Could not get FVM releases"
echo "Default shell: $SHELL"; which claude 2>/dev/null || echo "claude not in PATH"; which zsh
fvm flutter pub get && melos bootstrap 2>&1

pattern.context_summary: Environment setup exploration - checking FVM status, shell config, releases, then installing Flutter. Multiple sequential Bash calls to understand environment before taking action. This is exploratory work that doesn't accumulate context.
pattern.ideal_approach: impl-flutter:flutter-env agent should handle environment setup holistically - check current state, determine needed actions, execute in one pass. Currently user is manually probing the environment.
pattern.improvement_hypothesis: The impl-flutter:flutter-env agent should have an 'ensure-environment' behavior that: 1) checks all environment prerequisites in parallel, 2) identifies gaps, 3) presents user with clear options if decisions needed, 4) executes setup steps automatically
